A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw with a group of 4.  Two old enough to have seen the original first run in the theater A LONG TIME AGO... and the other 2 milenials.  2 male\, 2 female.  We all enjoyed.   Sure\, some corny scenes (but the Cantina in the first film wasnt corny) lots of action\, could have cut a few things but overall we all loved it and we are looking forward to seeing the next one.
